name: Haberdashery
description: A shop selling men's clothing accessories and small items; adventurers can purchase hats, gloves, ties, or other fashionable accessories for formal occasions.
atmosphere: The shop is filled with the refined scent of fine fabrics and the subtle aroma of gentlemanly grooming. The sound of careful measurements and the rustle of elegant accessories creates a sophisticated, upscale atmosphere. The air carries the promise of refined style and the importance of proper presentation.
